Posts.Content: Jun 20, 2009 04:55PM celteyes wrote: I breastfed all three of my kiddos and no history of BC anyplace in the family. I don't think it has anything to do with it no matter what they say. I just finished reading a book that talks about our childhood vaccines (polio) to be specific...apparently mutated and it was predicted that the baby boomer generation would have an epidemic of soft tissue cancers...ugh..well here I am with no cancer history in the family in my parents generation, but starting to have cousins, siblingsÂ and friends with different kinds.
